content:
Sleeping in a tent after the tea party,
It really feels like camping!

But take it easy~ Let's rest for a bit!
Hey, between you and me, I saw Mobai preparing something special.
Why don't you have a chat with Mobai before heading back to the tent?

I want to get familiar with the environment of this world bubble first,
And take a little stroll around~!
<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>, if you get tired, remember to talk to Mobai before heading back to the tent.
Just thinking about growing together with <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color> and everyone else while building <color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color>... I don't know why, but it really moves me!
